definition: (lit.) to cry over one's dad's death (from Taiwanese 哭爸, Tai-lo pr. [khàu-pē])/(slang) (Tw) to rattle on/to carp/stop whining!/shut the hell up!/fuck!/damn!
to lean against or on/to stand by the side of/to come near to/to depend on/to trust/to fuck (vulgar)/traditional military costume drama where the performers wear armor (old)

sentences.english: Being near to the north wall is my computer table , still has the comfortable boss of a handful chair.
sentences.chinese: 靠北墙是我的电脑桌，还有一把舒服的老板椅。

sentences.english: Head to the back, or northern , side.
sentences.chinese: 到后面去，或者说，靠北的那一边。

sentences.english: I come from a place farther north, quite on the borders of Scotland.
sentences.chinese: 我来自很靠北的一个地方，靠近苏格兰边界了。

sentences.english: As its name indicates, it was one of the Moorish settlements, and nearly one of the most northern.
sentences.chinese: 地如其名，它几乎是最靠北的摩尔人定居点。

sentences.english: I wanted to go a more northerly route across Montana.
sentences.chinese: 我想走一条穿过蒙大拿州的更靠北的路线。

sentences.english: It shouldn't have sailed so far north.
sentences.chinese: 它本不应该在那么靠北的海面行驶。
